title: Reuben sandwich
description: This recipe makes enough for one sandwich, including the Russian dressing. Just scale it up to make more sandwiches, and any extra dressing will keep in the fridge.If your meat is at room temperature, not straight from the fridge, it will help the other ingredients warm through and melt the cheese.
ingredients: 2 cornichon or ½ dill pickle, finely chopped
2 slices light rye bread or sourdough
few slices Swiss cheese, such as emmental or gruyère
salt and freshly ground black pepper
